00029 #ifndef __TBB_task_scheduler_init_H
00030 #define __TBB_task_scheduler_init_H
00031 
00032 #include "tbb_stddef.h"
00033 #include "limits.h"
00034 
00035 namespace tbb {
00036 
00037 typedef std::size_t stack_size_type;
00038 
00040 namespace internal {
00042 
00043     class scheduler;
00044 } // namespace internal
00046 
00048 
00061 class task_scheduler_init: internal::no_copy {
00062     enum ExceptionPropagationMode {
00063         propagation_mode_exact = 1u,
00064         propagation_mode_captured = 2u,
00065         propagation_mode_mask = propagation_mode_exact | propagation_mode_captured
00066     };
00067 
00069     internal::scheduler* my_scheduler;
00070 public:
00071 
00073     static const int automatic = -1;
00074 
00076     static const int deferred = -2;
00077 
00079 
00090     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD initialize( int number_of_threads=automatic );
00091 
00093 
00094     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD initialize( int number_of_threads, stack_size_type thread_stack_size );
00095 
00097     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD terminate();
00098 
00100     task_scheduler_init( int number_of_threads=automatic, stack_size_type thread_stack_size=0 ) : my_scheduler(NULL)  {
00101         // Two lowest order bits of the stack size argument may be taken to communicate
00102         // default exception propagation mode of the client to be used when the
00103         // client manually creates tasks in the master thread and does not use
00104         // explicit task group context object. This is necessary because newer 
00105         // TBB binaries with exact propagation enabled by default may be used 
00106         // by older clients that expect tbb::captured_exception wrapper.
00107         // All zeros mean old client - no preference. 
00108         __TBB_ASSERT( !(thread_stack_size & propagation_mode_mask), "Requested stack size is not aligned" );
00109 #if TBB_USE_EXCEPTIONS
00110         thread_stack_size |= TBB_USE_CAPTURED_EXCEPTION ? propagation_mode_captured : propagation_mode_exact;
00111 #endif /* TBB_USE_EXCEPTIONS */
00112         initialize( number_of_threads, thread_stack_size );
00113     }
00114 
00116     ~task_scheduler_init() {
00117         if( my_scheduler ) 
00118             terminate();
00119         internal::poison_pointer( my_scheduler );
00120     }
00122 
00139     static int __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC default_num_threads ();
00140 
00142     bool is_active() const { return my_scheduler != NULL; }
00143 };
00144 
00145 } // namespace tbb
00146 
00147 #endif /* __TBB_task_scheduler_init_H */
